allowDefaultCaseForExhaustiveSwitch.description: If true, allow default cases on switch statements that are already exhaustive

considerDefaultExhaustiveForUnions.description: If true, the presence of a default case makes a union type switch exhaustive

defaultCaseCommentPattern.description: A regular pattern for a comment explaining why the default case is not exhaustive

requireDefaultForNonUnion.description: If true, require a default clause for switches on non-union types
